entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 12:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 except minus 28 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
